This is from Gateway Electronics, they used to have a store here, but closed 
it. I almost bought one of these! This would be great for tuning a radio, 
and I bet it would be farly easy to randonly control, but that may not be 
necessary, maybe like Dave said, just steady tuning acorss the band, back 
and forth?

Frank
